item.title: Impossible Distancing on Charleston Sidewalks
item.description: Since March 26, the City of Charleston has been under a “Shelter-in-Place” ordinance, encouraging Charlestonians to stay home except for essential trips (grocery store, doctor’s appointments, etc).
